African Surveyors Day June 14th #ISW2020

 Celebrate the Land Surveying Profession in countries of Africa by sharing stories in the African Land Surveyors Forum and by uploading photos of surveying in Africa to the network to increase public awareness about the importance of Land Surveyors to Society.

North American Surveyors Day June 15 #ISW2020

 An entire day for us to celebrate the Land Surveying Profession in countries of North America and the Caribbean by sharing stories in the Land Surveyors Forums and by uploading photos of surveying in North America to the network to increase public awareness.

 Celebrate the Land Surveying Profession in countries of Asia by sharing stories in the Asian Land Surveyors Forum and by uploading photos of surveying in Asia to the network to increase public awareness and bring local land surveyors together.

üìçSurvey Earth in a Day 9 June 20 #ISW2020

THIS FREE EVENT for Land Surveyors OCCURS AT YOUR LOCATION SO IF YOU PLAN TO SUBMIT A POINT, CLICK "GOING' THIS IS A FREE EVENT FOR LAND SURVEYORS ONLY Reasons to Participate in #SEIAD9 - Demonstrate to the public that only a Land Surveyor can measure with such accuracy -Monitor shifts in the planet's surface over time as a community of land surveyors -Commemorate International Surveyors Week 2020 -Gather GPS data worldwide as a community of Professional Land Surveyors -Continue to refine the models of the surface of the Earth. (must -meet specific requirements Markers/GPS Data/Equipment) -Promote a demystifed system of understanding the means of measurement using satellite positioning systems among land surveyors.
